content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in pesaro on september 1 2016 the case involves two parties one of which is not named the text explains the progress of a legal case regarding compensation the court has declared the dissolution of a community property between the parties the movable property a savings deposit with carifano spa will be divided with twothirds going to the defendant and onethird divided equally among the plaintiffs the court has also declared the dissolution of community property regarding real estate in the municipality of barchi the court has assigned a residential property to the defendant and a garage and building to the plaintiffs the court has ordered the plaintiffs to pay the defendant an equal share of the balance owed plus legal interest the costs of the proceedings will be divided between the parties the court has also ordered the judgment to be transcribed by the registrar any claims or objections have been dismissed
